traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.desc: The ogre has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The ogre’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The ogre can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: light, mold earth, create bonfire * 1/day each: earth tremor, enhance ability, fog cloud, color spray

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
